RelatedSentence: Nearly 200 demonstrators gathered in Marktown Park , a neighborhood in East Chicago , Indiana , as part of a nationwide day of action that took place in more than 100 cities to protest the use of fossil fuels and to urge President Obama to reject the Keystone XL tar sands pipeline .
